# <a name="error-550553-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="965c6-102">Greška 550/553 u Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="965c6-102">Error 550/553 in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="965c6-103">Kada se udaljite od kuće i pošaljete e-poruku sa povezanog naloga pomoću Outlook.com, e-poruka može biti vraćena sa porukom o grešci 550, 553 ili zabranjenu za prenos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="965c6-103">When you're away from home and send an email from your connected account using Outlook.com, your email message might be returned with a 550, 553, or relay-prohibited error message.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="965c6-104">Proverite [postavke sinhronizacije e-pošte](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) na **postavkama**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="965c6-104">Check your [email sync settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) at **Settings**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="965c6-105">> **Prikaži sve postavke** > **Mail** > Outlook **-a sinhronizujte e-poštu**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="965c6-105">> **View all Outlook settings** > **Mail** > **Sync email**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="965c6-106">Uverite se da je podrazumevana vrednost sa adrese isto što i ime domena e-pošte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="965c6-106">Make sure your default from address is the same as your email domain name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="965c6-107">Ako ste uključili sopstveni domen e-pošte, promenite ga u outlook.com, live.com ili hotmail.com adresu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="965c6-107">If you have your own email domain included, change it to your outlook.com, live.com, or hotmail.com address.</span></span>
